localization
Class LocalizationI

java.lang.Object
  localization.LocalizationI
All Implemented Interfaces:
LineReaderListener
public class LocalizationI
extends java.lang.Object
implements LineReaderListener

Does the localization, assuming all used threads are started.

yuechuan
